data_description.api_version: Version 1 uses hourly electricity prices, version 2 updates every 15 minutes. Select the version which matches your provider's pricing interval or you may get incorrect data!

data.entities_default_enabled: Enable all sensors for all providers

data_description.api_version: Version 1 uses hourly electricity prices, version 2 updates every 15 minutes. Select the version which matches your provider's pricing interval or you may get incorrect data!
data_description.entities_default_enabled: By default all sensors are disabled to reduce clutter. You can either enable all sensors by default, enable the sensors for specific providers by selecting them below or enable them manually later in the Entities list for the Enever device.
